description: Everyone needs a good backup plan, and this is a very good option for those running Plasma. Supports multiple profiles and different media very well. Worth checkng out!
the app was coveniant for me
Very limited settings, backs up only as archive and no other options
Very limited in settings options, backs up only as archive
It works very well for me

It can't connect to a network drive, that is even after you open its directory tree and select it!Connects to my local drive but why would I want to backup the files on there to the fies on there. I tried to uninstall thru Discover and Discover tells me it cant, tried to reinstall but it hangs at 30%. As if they did not knwo these problems. A FAQ question asks if it works over the network...first what kind of backup program does work t a network drive...really?!?!?, Second I went to the so called site but its an old wreck, all you can see is some dir with "old" in it, if there a network version, or even a version to down load they hid it pretty well and give zero instruction on how to install as if everyone is some linux geek that only types incredibly crytic commands in a 1980's DOS window. Get with it , on all fronts. Avoid this like the plague.
Meldet immer Medium voll und es sind noch 176 GB frei. Wird sofort gelöscht
